input.sentences: we went to the club last night to party .
a lot of our friends were already there .
we met a lot of new people and had a great time .
we danced and got pretty crazy !
it was a fantastic night and we had so much fun .
output.sentences: We went to party at the nightclub.
I don't have a lot of friends, but I feel like I belong in a crowd.
Time flew by as I met many new people.
